readable.title: 3257107194_f235c8f7ab
readable.content: One man in the hole of a tire in water , and another man getting up from the water next to him . Two boys hanging off a tire dock . Two men are playing with tires in muddy water . Two men climb onto tires while sitting in the muddy water . Two men trying to hoist themselves up from the water on to a walkway made of tires .
